articles.description: Weber Grills has plans to launch a new line, CEO Chris Scherzinger told CNBC on Thursday ahead of the company's public listing Aug. 5.
articles.content:
Weber Grills has plans to launch a new line this year that redefines propane grilling, CEO Chris Scherzinger told CNBC on Thursday ahead of the company's public listing. 
On "Squawk on the Street," … [+2389 chars]

articles.author: Matt Egan, CNN Business
articles.title: Big banks are starting to push back their return to offices in response to Delta variant - CNN
articles.description: Major players on Wall Street are beginning to push back their return-to-office dates because of surging Covid-19 cases.

articles.author: Andrew Dunn
articles.title: Moderna says we'll need COVID-19 booster shots this fall, predicting that protection from its vaccine will wane - Yahoo News
articles.description: "We really do believe the virus is here to stay for the long term," a top Moderna executive said.
articles.content:
The biotech firm Moderna on Thursday said it expected that a third dose of its COVID-19 vaccine would be necessary before the winter, saying protection from the shot could fade over time.
